text: England competed at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada, 3 to 12 August 1978. England finished second in the medal table. ==Medal table (top three)== The athletes that competed are listed below. ==Athletics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250| Name
